title: Singapore Odyssea: A Journey Through Time
blurb: Embark on a time-travelling voyage through Singapore!
description: Discover Singapore's 700-year history at Singapore Odyssea, a new signature experience within the Shaw Foundation Glass Rotunda. This multimedia showcase blends light, art, and interactive storytelling for an immersive experience. Pick up an RFID wristband to activate your magical companion, inspired by Singapore native wildlife, and let it guide you through stunning visuals, animated dioramas, and encounters with legendary creatures. Rediscover Singaporeâ€™s history and the importance of the sea, while engaging with environmental conservation and sustainability. Perfect for families and visitors of all ages.
Keyword_tag: Singapore history, multimedia showcase, interactive storytelling, environmental conservation, family-friendly, immersive experience
